power.title: Bardic Lore
power.fluff: Using your magic to sharpen your momery, you recall an important piece of information that you picked up in a story or a song you heard in your travels

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The first time you make an Arcana check, Dungeoneering check, History check, Nature check, or Religion check to recall knowledge, instead of rolling, you treat your roll as 20 instead of rolling.

power.title: Beguiling Ballad
power.fluff: Just as your foe thinks victory is assured, you weave a curtain of fey magic that makes it think its enemy was never there

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy in range hits an ally with an attack

section.name: Target:
section.target: the triggering enemy and the triggering ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target ally is invisible to the target enemy (save ends).
The target ally can teleport 5 squares as a free reaction.

power.title: Canon of Avoidance
power.fluff: Your song of protecting trips from ally to ally, cloaking each one in a magical shield

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The effect persists. When you sustain the effect, you can choose to transfer it to another ally within 10 squares of you.

power.title: Clockwork Precision
power.fluff: You hum a simple tune of unity, allowing you and your allies to better work together

section.name: Target:
section.target: you and each ally in the burst.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, each target gains a +2 bonus to checks to aid another.
When a target aids another, aids attack, or aids defense, he or she grants a +3 bonus instead of a +2 bonus.

power.title: Concerted Effort
power.fluff: Your magic hums around your allies, growing in power as they redouble their efforts toward the task at hand

section.name: Target:
section.target: you and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, each target gains a +1 power bonus to attack rolls.
Whenever a target hits with at least one attack during his or her turn, the bonus increases by 1 after that character's turn has ended.

power.title: Hunter's Tune
power.fluff: You shape the flow of sound, containing and creating an area of silence

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target gains a +5 power bonus to Stealth checks and doesn't take a penalty to Stealth checks for moving more than 2 squares or running.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn. You cannot sustain the effect if you cannot see the target.
If you use this power outside of combat, you can sustain it for up to 1 hour.

power.title: Inspire Competence
power.fluff: Your magic channels the skill of ancient experts to help with the task at hand

section.name: Target:
section.target: you and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose a skill.
Each target gains a +2 power bonus to the first check he or she makes using the chosen skill.

power.title: Moment of Escape
power.fluff: You distract your enemies with a quick refrain, giving your embattled ally a chance to get away

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You slide the target 4 squares.

power.title: Song of Courage
power.fluff: Your magic creates shouts of encouragement, making it seem as though an entire army were cheering on your allies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 5 (Arcane) until the end of your next turn.
Allies in the aura gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The aura persists until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Words of Protective Fate
power.fluff: Your voice shields your allies against misfortune, turning otherwise deadly blows into less damaging strikes

section.name: Target:
section.target: you and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, whenever a critical hit is scored on the target, you roll a d20. If you roll a 10 or higher, the attack is a hit but not a critical hit.
